abstract: Chris Wallace, first Fox News journalist to moderate general election debate, displays wit and perseverance in managing contentious third and final encounter between Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton.
lead_paragraph: While Mr. Wallace maintained a genteel presence, he also issued some sharply phrased questions that were sure to irk his skeptics.
snippet: While Mr. Wallace maintained a genteel presence, he also issued some sharply phrased questions that were sure to irk his skeptics....

headline.main: Chris Wallace, Mixing Humor With Scolding, Guides Final Debate
headline.print_headline: Mixing Humor With Scolding to Defuse Clashes in a Final Substantive Encounter
